  • Data Structures for a Message Object
  • View page source

Data Structures for a Message Object

  • StoreProductId represents a composite ID combining product_id and competitor_id.

  • CrawlJobRequest represents a job request containing the StoreProductId, product URL, host, and dispatched timestamp.

  • CrawledPrice contains the crawled price and its associated currency.

  • CrawlJobResponse represents the response for a crawl job, including the StoreProductId, crawled price, processing time, status, and any error message.

class crawler.queue_handler.MessageDataObjects.CrawlJobRequest(job_id: StoreProductId, product_url: str, host: str, dispatched_timestamp: str)

Represents a job request received from the message queue.

dispatched_timestamp: str
host: str
job_id: StoreProductId
product_url: str
class crawler.queue_handler.MessageDataObjects.CrawlJobResponse(job_id: StoreProductId, crawledPrice: CrawledPrice | None, processTime: int, crawledTimestamp: str | None, status: str, errorMessage: str | None)

Represents the response for a crawl job.

crawledPrice: CrawledPrice | None
crawledTimestamp: str | None
errorMessage: str | None
job_id: StoreProductId
processTime: int
status: str
class crawler.queue_handler.MessageDataObjects.CrawledPrice(price: float | None, currency: str | None)

Represents a crawled price object

currency: str | None
price: float | None
class crawler.queue_handler.MessageDataObjects.StoreProductId(product_id: int, competitor_id: int)

Represents the ID of a store product, combining productId and competitorId.

competitor_id: int
product_id: int
